relation.text: 1786 My dear Mr. Dickenson I hope
now & her spirits are rather better . Sunning Hill is such a sweet place I wish
complain 'd so much of when we had you for our guest , I do miſs you a little bit every now
about 19 years of age , he is dreſs 'd in Armour very handsome , & I think
the monday before , he therefore made
